title: Cassini Imaging Centre (Post-Launch Support)
abstractText: We propose to continue to continue activities associated with the operation of the Imaging Science Subsystem instrument on the Cassini spacecraft in the Cassini Equinox Mission (until 30 September 2010) and the Cassini Solstice Mission (from 1 October 2010). This will include requesting imaging sequences of rings and small satellites, seeing such requests through the integration process, designing the parameters of such sequences and finally using the returned data. Reduced satellite orbital data will be forwarded to the project.
